code: import axios from"axios";var _BASE_URL="http://localhost:5051";export var postRequest=function postRequest(path,data){return axios.post("".concat(_BASE_URL).concat(path),data,{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}});};export var getRequest=function getRequest(path){return axios.get("".concat(_BASE_URL).concat(path),{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}});};
